channel.title: Changing the picture/transparency over inventory? SS's included
channel.description:
Alright, I have been working on this client for a while, but I am not sure how to edit this picture, as I am not that experienced in client work. If you can help with this issue (Picture Placed Below) then please post. What I really need to know, is just the folder or .java document I need to change it in. I have gone through ALL of my pictures in my client, none have anything to do with this. So my guess is, that the picture was placed with a link. Yet, I need to know where the link is.
[img]http://img127.imageshack.us/img127/9946/yayl.png[/img]
Any help at ALL is appreciated, please do not flame, as I am newer to the client making.
Thanks, Totalown( Owner of Dark Pk)

It should be in your sprites folder of your client. Just look through them.
